channel.title: Osama Sakhi on Osama Sakhi
channel.description: Recent content in Osama Sakhi on Osama Sakhi

item.title: I Left My Job to Teach High-Schoolers at a Summer Camp, Here's What I Learned
item.description:
In Summer 2018, I became an Instructor for two courses offered by Duke TIP:

  • Applications, Algorithms, Computers: Modern Programming @ Rice University
  • Artificial Intelligence @ Georgia Tech

Through this experience, I learned to design courses end-to-end, including crafting syllabi, conducting lectures, creating assignments, & engaging in parent-teacher conferences.

item.title: Course Lineup 2018
item.description:
In Fall 2018, he will be taking the following courses:

  • Quantum Mechanics
  • Computer Vision
  • Computational Data Analysis
  • CSE Algorithms
